nodes.text: Justin Chin is an author and artist. While working for LucasArts, Chin wrote the storyline and acted as lead artist for Star Wars: Dark Forces and Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II. He currently works at Telltale games as an executive producer.
The Expanded Universe elements of Kyle Katarn, Dark troopers and various weapons such as the Bryar pistol, are credited to him.
